shambler.name: Shambler
shambler.description: Slow, high HP melee unit. Kite with one player, DPS with other.

swarmer.name: Swarmer
swarmer.description: Fast, low HP, surrounds players. One baits, one clears flanks.

shieldbearer.name: Shieldbearer
shieldbearer.description: Front shield blocks 70% damage. Attack from opposite sides.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.description: Stationary long-range laser. One draws fire, one flanks.
